name: Queen Elsa's Wedding
description:
Queen Elsa is getting married in a very elegant place in the open air. She is very excited about her wedding, she is nervous because she wants everything to go as planned.

The hours pass and the bride does not know which wedding dress to wear. Your closet is so large that it is difficult to choose, we have to help it !.

Let's dress Elsa with an elegant dress for brides. She goes to the salon to get her elegant hairstyle; Also choose some heels, and many other accessories, that every girl should use. She will be the center of attention at the wedding.

There are a variety of suits to combine as you like:

- many wedding dresses
- many tops
- many hairstyles, heels and more

Do you want to be a fashion designer?
Use your creativity to put together the best combinations.

Be a fashion designer and have fun with our dress up games for girls.

Dress up games for girls.
